title: Production readiness: static assets and canonical logo wiring

requirements.summary: Ensure all static asset paths referenced by the marketing site resolve in production, including canonical generated logo and favicon assets.
acceptanceCriteria: The site renders without broken-image icons for the header/footer logo and hero wordmark/background.
All static asset paths referenced in `frontend/src/App.tsx` exist under `frontend/public` with matching filenames and extensions.

file_operations.description: Add the canonical square logo asset under public static assets, ensuring it matches the filename referenced by `frontend/src/App.tsx`. Source should be the uploaded/derived generated logo from the workspace asset `generated/ngfc-logo.dim_1024x1024.png`.
Add the required favicon-style icon as a public static asset. Source should be the uploaded/derived generated favicon image per the BuildRequest requirement.
Ensure the hero background image exists at the exact public path referenced by `frontend/src/App.tsx`. Source should be the workspace asset `generated/ngfc-hero-bg.dim_2400x1350.png`.
Ensure the hero wordmark image exists at the exact public path referenced by `frontend/src/App.tsx`. Source should be the workspace asset `generated/ngfc-wordmark.dim_1800x600.png`.
Add gallery image at the exact public path referenced by `frontend/src/App.tsx`. Create from the corresponding uploaded workspace file `WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.11.10 PM (1).jpeg`.
